items.title: Plot stacked bar chart
items.content_html:
How to plot stacked bar chart with labels on each fraction in python

!!! summary "Summary" This post shows the very basic steps to plot stacked bar chart using python with an example on a simplified imaginary dataset.

items.title: How To insert extra tags into head block in base.html (mkdocs)
items.content_html:
How To insert extra tags into head block in base.html (mkdocs)

!!! Summary "Summary" This is a short post to describe how to insert extra tags in to #!html <head> block in your doc or blog site built by mkdocs. 

At the end you will see how I added adsense to my mkdocs site.

This post is going to follow the recommanded approach. For more detail see 
[Overriding blocks](https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/customization/#overriding-blocks).

How to set up Miniconda on linux server

!!! Summary "Summary" A short How-to post to document how to set up Miniconda on linux server.
